name: spac_price_targets
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spachero_spac_database.
Tool description: Official spacHero  SPAC API  with live rankings, SPAC target names, merger meetings, warrant redemption deadlines, price targets, SEC filings, investor presentations and more.
API description: Fetches the latest SPAC (Special Purpose Acquisition Company) price targets from analysts, filtered by a specific SPAC symbol.

symbol.description: The SPAC symbol to filter the price targets by. Defaults to 'SOFI'.
